code: export var addComment=function addComment(comment,destinationId){return function(dispatch){fetch("https://gonefishin-frontend.herokuapp.com//destinations/".concat(destinationId,"/comments"),{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(comment)}).then(function(response){return response.json();}).then(function(destination){return dispatch({type:'ADD_COMMENT',payload:destination});});};};export default addComment;
